license.notes: BSD-3-Clause. The rosbridge v2.0 protocol spec (ROSBRIDGE_PROTOCOL.md) is the model source for the WebSocket/JSON bridge message types. Portarium's ROS 2 adapter connects via rosbridge when direct DDS bridging (Zenoh) is not available.

extraction.notes: Parse ROSBRIDGE_PROTOCOL.md to extract protocol operation entities: subscribe, unsubscribe, publish, advertise, unadvertise, call_service, service_response, set_level, status. Map to CIF entities/actions.
